name: Blinky (Hans Christian Egeberg, 1991)
desc:
Blinky is a clone of the famous game Pacman, ported to CHIP-8. You have to collect all the dots, evading the ghosts! The game keeps score of the number of dots you have collected.

Control Blinky/Pacman with UP, DOWN, LEFT and RIGHT. Restart the game with A or B.
